Name: 8-Bit Commando
About the game: 8-Bit Commando is a run and gun platformer with fast-paced action, a rocking soundtrack (from the chiptunes artist Ozzed), local/online multiplayer and explosions. The graphics will take you back to the classic age of gaming and the gameplay is bound to challenge even the most seasoned vets.
Meta Description: Looking for information on 8-Bit Commando? Check out the release date (Jun 2, 2014), developer insights from 2dengine, and a complete game summary.
